contents.name: BaseVoltage
contents.comment: Base voltage of this conducting equipment.  Use only when there is no voltage level container used and only one base voltage applies.  For example, not used for transformers.

contents.name: Terminals
contents.comment: Conducting equipment have terminals that may be connected to other conducting equipment terminals via connectivity nodes or topological nodes.

description: The parts of the AC power system that are designed to carry current or that are conductively connected through terminals.
comment: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models
